
snap(20,-30,-60)

sky(200,227,255)
fog(215,245,220) 
ground(195,210,217)

fadefrom(7000)

name(The Mad Party)

nlaps(10)

set(35,0,0,250,0)p
set(35,0,5600,250,0)p
set(35,0,11200,250,0)p
set(35,0,16800,250,0)p
set(40,0,22400,250,0)p
set(34,0,26950,250,-90)p
chk(60,-1750,26950,250,90)
set(34,-3500,26950,250,0)p
set(30,-3500,22400,250,0)p
set(30,-3500,16800,250,0)p
set(30,-3500,11200,250,0)p
set(30,-3500,5600,250,0)p
set(40,-3500,0,250,0)p
set(37,0,-4550,250,180)p
chk(62,-1750,-4550,250,90)
set(53,0,11200,250,180)
set(52,-3500,11200,250,180)
set(37,-3500,-4550,250,90)p

maxr(8,3000,-6000)
maxb(2,-8400,-4200)
maxl(8,-6600,-6000)
maxt(2,30000,-4200)
